description: Luke Adams has just moved into his new bachelor pad when his neighbor, Cliff Jensen, comes by hoping to use his shower as his isn’t working. Luke proceeds to suck Cliff’s hot dick, slapping his face with it, and even getting his face fucked. Good times continue to roll as Cliff drills his stiff rod into Luke’s excited hole.
title: The Apartment Part 1
